regular-title: That moment with a detective story
regular-body:
I really like Endgame, I do. But the mysteries just aren’t fun enough. And I think I’ve finally hit one that I’ve completely figured out 30 minutes in. Don’t send me back to L&O:SVU, please.

Update, 10 minutes later: Dear Endgame, all is forgiven! You might have predictable mystery solutions, but you play it out well, and you do have a great sense of humour.

Update, mere seconds after last update: And then they play it off with an The Importance of Being Ernest reference. All is right with the world.
